title: Adani Group seeks to invest $900 million in Tanzania power lines
description: Tanzania is negotiating with the Adani Group and UK company Gridworks Development Partners for public-private partnerships involving $900 million and $300 million power-line projects. The Adani Group is also expanding in East Africa, including a 30-year concession in Dar es Salaam and ongoing talks in Kenya, sparking local protests and legal actions.
